title: Strengthening Business Practical Competencies: Service-Learning Project Design for Supporting Elderly with Dementia

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Capable of identifying dementia stage-specific symptoms and patient family stress factors with 80% accuracy
Develop at least three customized activity programs for elderly dementia patients using the PBL (Problem-Based Learning) approach
Through reflective journaling, analyze at least five ethical dilemmas encountered during service learning and establish response strategies
Successfully perform at least three out of four family caregiving scenarios in VR simulation assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
